entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 29.
